pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.model

Class CourseOfStudies

  • java.lang.Object
    • pme.ai.fhe.de.studybuddy.model.CourseOfStudies

  • public class CourseOfStudies
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the course of studies entity. It has a foreign key connection to the university_id of the University model. That represents, which university the course belongs to.
